name: Chroma Donuts (Windows Only)
description:
In 2025, terror swept across DonutLand, a gang called the Red Raspberry triggered a full blown gang war across the land's various sky cities, one day, one donut came home from work to find his donut wife and child had been captured and eaten alive by the gang members. From then on, he decided that he was gonna take them down, all of them...

Hi, this is my first completed game, and basically my first game ever (i had starts that never got to anything playable cause i forgot about them after like, a week), starting with a game jam maybe wasn't the best idea, but it was either that or i was gonna start another project only to lose interest after mere days. And it was fun and made me learn a whole bunch of useful things so that's good.

Hopefully you'll like it, or at the very least not hate it to infinity and beyond.

(Only works on Windows cause Unity wouldn't let me build for Mac/Linux for some reason, i'll see if i can figure out why before the next game jam or project i end up doing)
